availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac W. Scott (Fayette County, Kentucky, manufacturer)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, manufacturer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Pickett Scott in Fayette County, Kentucky, on May 15, 1855. Manufacturer in Lexington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 425
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport – Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7011806, Fayette County Deaths, p. 2038
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Fayette County Marriages, p. 6.
